title: IP问题导致无法开服
author: 幻境雲達達
txt_content: 25.08 19:22:51 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "水桶1.7.2(有插件无MOD)"25.08 19:22:51 [Multicraft] Updating eula.txt file25.08 19:22:54 [Server] INFO Loading libraries, please wait...25.08 19:23:01 [Multicraft] Received start command25.08 19:23:01 [Multicraft] Server already running25.08 19:23:07 [Server] INFO Starting minecraft server version 1.7.225.08 19:23:07 [Server] INFO Loading properties25.08 19:23:07 [Server] INFO Default game type: SURVIVAL25.08 19:23:07 [Server] INFO Generating keypair25.08 19:23:07 [Server] INFO Starting Minecraft server on 0.0.0.0:3475425.08 19:23:08 [Server] WARN **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!25.08 19:23:08 [Server] WARN The exception was: java.net.BindException: Address already in use25.08 19:23:08 [Server] WARN Perhaps a server is already running on that port?

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 打开server.properties 找到 port : 默认是25565 换掉别的 比如说23333

replies.author: SYS_TEM
replies.txt_content:
端口被占用
找出占用25565端口点进程或者重启
实在不行换端口比如25564
上面2个人说的好  你换个端口把
